div.p: The NutritionProduct resource represents the identification of a food or fluid product consumed by patients. The scope of the NutritionProduct resource includes all the products that are understood to be food and beverage products for human consumption.

ul.li: Oral intake of food, fluids, oral nutritional supplements (i.e. Ensure), or enteral nutrition should be recorded using the NutritionIntake resource.
Supplements, such as vitamins, minerals, herbals, should be recorded using the medication resources
Parenteral nutrition should be recorded using the medication resources
